name: yahoo-fantasy-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for Yahoo Fantasy Sports API

scripts.build:all: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile yahoo-mcp-darwin-arm64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile yahoo-mcp-darwin-x64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile yahoo-mcp-linux-x64

author: Your Name
